 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָבַט‎</span>] **verb** ==beat off, beat out== (Late Hebrew ***id.; strike, beat***, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲבַט‎</span>) — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַחְבֹּט‎</span> [[Isa.27.12|Isa 27:12]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתַּחְבֹּט‎</span> [[Ruth.2.17|Ruth 2:17]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחְבֹּט‎</span> [[Deut.24.20|Deut 24:20]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֹבֵט‎</span> [[Judg.6.11|Judg 6:11]] — 

**1.** ***beat off***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זֵיתְךָ‎</span> [[Deut.24.20|Deut 24:20]]. 

**2.** ***beat out*** (grain), Gideon <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֹבֵט חִטִּים בַּגַּת‎</span> [[Judg.6.11|Judg 6:11]], so [[Ruth.2.17|Ruth 2:17]], of small quantities; — distinct from threshing on open floor, with cattle; figurative of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s judgment, and subsequent gathering of Israel [[Isa.27.12|Isa 27:12]] (no object expressed), so [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Du|Du]]; [[BDB#Ges|Ges]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Kn|Kn]] [[BDB#Brd|Brd]] place below **1**; [[BDB#VB|VB]] undecided. **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵחָ֫בֶט‎</span> [[Isa.28.27|Isa 28:27]] fennel (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֵצַךְ‎</span>) beaten out <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּמַּטֶּה‎</span>. 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲבָיָה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲבִיָּה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֳבָיָה‎</span> see below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חבה‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶבְיוֺן‎</span> see below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חבה‎</span>.
